long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
What if you click on a link and something weird link malware attack/online data theft happens?
The main problem is that you don't know which site has secure connections and which does not until you click on it.
Not to worry now. Link-no-link is an add-on which helps to identify the links with SECURE and NOT-SECURE connections by changing the color of the link. pink: "not secure" purple/no-color: "secure" yellow: not connected to any kind of link/URL(suspicious) .They don't lead you any where but may execute scripts.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
If any kind of bugs or problems are there, then immediately report by clicking on the add-on icon and then click on bugs.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
We don't collect any kind of data from your device.
